plot: After being over-whelmed by anguish from repeated viewing of a crime documentary involving his slain daughter, a grief-stricken man suffering from post-traumatic stress disorder goes on a deadly rampage as he attempts to right the wrong.
title: Aftermath
plot_es: After being over-whelmed by anguish from repeated viewing of a crime documentary involving his slain daughter, a grief-stricken man suffering from post-traumatic stress disorder goes on a deadly rampage as he attempts to right the wrong.
plot_en: After being over-whelmed by anguish from repeated viewing of a crime documentary involving his slain daughter, a grief-stricken man suffering from post-traumatic stress disorder goes on a deadly rampage as he attempts to right the wrong.
